column1:
Description

*[Column A]
 You can add keys to the column.
 Also, you can get the target string by using [LanguageManager.Instance.getFormattedString(key, params)].

*[Column B]
 The column is used for explaing parameters that you can use with [string.Format],
 so the column will be ignored.

*[Column C]
 The column is used for example,

*[Row 1]
 You can add languages you want to add from UnityEngine.SystemLanguage.

*[(Others)]
 Be careful in showing any error messages or URL 
 because sometimes it makes users hack your app and server easily.
